music.title: Discover my music
music.description:
Outside of coding, music plays an essential role in my life. I‚Äôve been playing guitar for many years, with a special love for saturated, atmospheric, and energetic sounds. From psychedelic rock to stoner, sometimes touching on heavier metal influences.

During my two years in Rennes, this passion came to life through an album project with three musician friends: Hugo, Charles, and Adrien. Together, we crafted a sound that reflects who we are, blending progressive rock, psychedelia, and heavier sonic journeys.

about.smallDesc: Hi! I‚Äôm No√©, a fullstack developer with a bit of a project manager mindset. I‚Äôm passionate about visuals, sound and movement,  always ready to learn and build things. Scroll down if you want to know more about my slightly offbeat journey üëá
about.resume: Fullstack developer and freelance digital project manager. 3 years in a Parisian agency and numerous freelance missions. I help businesses, associations and independents create clear, fast and reliable websites and applications. I offer concrete solutions and respect deadlines and budget. Available for a one-off mission or ongoing support. Feel free to contact me for a project.

part1.title: Hey, I‚Äôm No√©
part1.text: I just got back from a year-long van road trip across New Zealand. I took a break from coding to focus on exploring, meeting people, and capturing the landscapes through photography. That journey gave me fresh perspective, new ideas, and even more motivation to create.

part2.title: From math teacher to developer
part2.text: I studied for a Master‚Äôs degree in Digital Project Management in Rennes, where I specialized in fullstack development. That dual profile gave me both technical and strategic skills: clean coding, solid architecture, but also client communication, planning, and teamwork. I originally planned to become a math teacher, I liked the logic and precision, but I eventually found coding to be the perfect balance between logic, creativity, and impact.

part3.title: 3 years at Bob le D√©veloppeur
part3.text: I spent three years at Bob le D√©veloppeur, a web agency in Paris, working as a fullstack developer during my work-study program. I built custom applications using modern stacks like Next.js and Nest.js, and I got involved in the whole project process: client calls, need assessments, sprint planning‚Ä¶ Working in a small team taught me to take on different roles and to always keep the product vision in mind.

part4.title: What drives me outside of code
part4.text: Outside of development, I'm passionate about music and photography. I love composing, experimenting with sound, capturing moments, they‚Äôre creative outlets that complement coding well: they require precision, intuition, and attention to detail. To stay balanced after long hours in front of the screen, I turn to swimming and climbing, two sports that help me stay focused, grounded, and energized.

item1.diploma: Master's Degree in Digital Project Management

item2.diploma: Bachelor's Degree in Web and Mobile Development

item3.diploma: Bachelor's Degree in Mathematics, Physics, and Computer Science
